lender.name: Kali
lender.loan_because: I strive to make a difference, even if its a small one.
lender.occupational_info: I go to school full time, and plan to start at the University of Colorado in the fall of 2008

lender.name: Vinny
lender.loan_because: I believe the smallest actions can make the biggest difference!
lender.occupational_info: I manage a coffee shop called Dunkin' Donuts. Dunkin Donuts is a franchise which has stores in over 98 different countries and has over 5,000 stores. I have been doing this for 6 years now.

lender.name: Holly
lender.loan_because: I truly believe in this organization. I want to help women in other areas of the world succeed and be able to support themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I help my company's Bangalore, India location grow.

lender.name: Yoon
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.

lender.name: chialu
lender.loan_because: i think it is a great idea to help someone in need and to help someone to create something that is sustainable for him/herself that is even better.
lender.occupational_info: i am a freelance graphic designer. i design mostly branding and identity system for the corporate world.

lender.name: Elizabeth & Michael
lender.loan_because: I can. Quoting Mohandas Gandhi, "Be the change that you wish to see in the world."
lender.occupational_info: Elizabeth works for a free clinic for the uninsured. Michael works in machine manufacturing.

lender.name: Arathi
lender.loan_because: it makes me feel good! A selfish reason, perhaps, but an important one. Having been blessed with wonderful parents, great friends and good health, I want to help someone else out in my own small way.

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: I know it is right.
lender.occupational_info: I teach adolescents with special needs.

lender.name: Moses
lender.loan_because: I can no longer accept that morality is something to commanded, or issued from tablets of stone. Rather, I have come to realize that empathy and mutual understanding are qualities that have grown and evolved in all of our hearts and minds, and that it is our responsibility to cultivate this part of ourselves to the best of our abilities. (In addition, I really feel quite terrible about what happened to the Midianites.)

lender.name: PNAI shORe
lender.loan_because: I am representing a group of people, PNAI shORe, who meet regularly for prayer meetings in the Jewish tradition. This year we decided to provide loans to small business people around the world.

lender.name: Monika
lender.loan_because: I'm an activist and want to do what I can to prevent the progression of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Mother-Baby RN at a non-profit hospital.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I believe in sustainable local economies. I believe in providing food, services and products to ones own community. I don't believe in a global economy, for one surely does not exist, nor should it. The only true economy is Water Soil Seeds and Air!
lender.occupational_info: I work in my heart. I listen to my heart. I know that the gifts of the Earth are not only for human consumption. I work on many levels to raise awareness of the imperative task of re-learning how to survive with our human and non human neighbors!

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: We won't make it on this planet as a species if we don't help one another. Honest, true help is the best there is...
lender.occupational_info: I am a remodeling contractor. I finish basements (lower underground levels) in homes and transform them into living spaces. I wrote a book about it.

lender.name: Tyler
lender.loan_because: Kiva provides an amzing vehicle to make a differnce in other parts of the world.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: Investment in human capital is the best investment.
lender.occupational_info: I trade agricultural commodities, interest rate futures, and equity futures

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student and I earn money by doing chores, working in the yard, and working for my neighbors.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: Helping even one person have a better life makes life better for all of us.
lender.occupational_info: I help businesses design software systems.

lender.name: Erik & Kim
lender.loan_because: I was fortunate enough to be born into the right family at the right time in the right place and others are not. I also feel like our government has so misrepresented our country that it is up to ourselves as individuals to show the true values of most Americans.
lender.occupational_info: I teach kids the importance of self-expression, the value of seeing things from another's perspective and the importance of working with others towards a common goal.

lender.name: Evan
lender.loan_because: "Do all the good you can, by all the means you can, in all the ways you can, in all the places you can, at all the times you can, to all the people you can, as long as ever you can." -Rev. John Wesley
lender.occupational_info: I teach 1st grade at American Horse School in Allen, SD on the Pine Ridge Indian Reservation.

lender.name: Arief Budiwidayanto
lender.loan_because: I simply believe that the world will become a better place if people care for, respect, love, and help each other.

lender.name: Nick
lender.loan_because: Hey, Why not?

lender.name: Greg&Lynn
lender.loan_because: We are hoping to help others

lender.name: Kayla Joiner Foundation
lender.loan_because:
Kayla was working on a project at school. It was called "Pay It Forward". It Read. If someone did you a favor - something big, something you couldn't do on your own and instead of paying it back, you paid it forward to three people.
You really can change the world if you care enough. Unfortunately, Kayla didn't get to finish her project. But I am going to keep paying it forward for Kayla. I know that is what she would have wanted. Kayla has the biggest heart and always wanted to help anyone who needed anything.
lender.occupational_info: Kayla's Family has set up this foundation in Kayla's honor to give scholarships to high school students who demonstrate a sincere will to pursue a pediatric nursing curriculum and can get the most pledges from fellow students to wear their seatbelt.

lender.name: Carson & Edna
lender.loan_because: My husband was disabled and lost his job when we still had children at home. I helped support our family through reselling used clothing and sports equipment. I inherited money from my sister, and now I am able to help others.

lender.name: Douglas
lender.loan_because: I can. We are all here to make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher in San Diego who is taking a year off to work towards my masters degree in education.

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: together we can make a difference...such a clich√© I know, but true! bzzzbee@bigpond.com

lender.name: Tigger
lender.loan_because: Its a way to improve lives from the ground up. I can re-cycle my money to make it help more people.
lender.occupational_info: I make websites work better

lender.name: Nigel
lender.loan_because: I'm lucky enough to be able to do so, and the money goes direct to someone who needs it with no overheads. I particularly like being able to lend the same $ multiple times.
lender.occupational_info: I work with the management of large US companies.

lender.name: Caroline & Ciar√°n
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to make their lives more comfortable for themselves and for their families.
lender.occupational_info: Ciaran is a professor of the science of sport and Caroline is a salesperson at a bank that lends money to companies trading between China and the US.

lender.name: Shuxin
lender.loan_because: I loan because I love to help mothers who are doing their best to look after the family and raise their children.

lender.name: C√©sar-Mario
lender.loan_because: It is an efficient and durable way to enable people to improve their lives.

lender.name: Jay & Claire
lender.loan_because: The hardest part of starting or expanding a business is the cash-squeeze upfront. Even more so in poorer countries. By lending through Kiva we're sponsoring the borrower to improve the lives of everyone in the community around them, as the borrower may offer goods or services previously unavailable in the community, and sometimes the borrower's business may employ others as well, providing money and work experience.
lender.occupational_info: Jay writes about how to use software. Claire designs web sites.

lender.name: Hanni
lender.loan_because: If women around the World are to be free, they have to be able to support themselves. In this way I can help sisters around the globe take the first fragile steps toward freedom.

lender.name: pascal
lender.loan_because: a) it's good , great feeling to help people who deserve it b) I know from my own experience that such small credits can have a big impact c) kiva is efficent & transparent
lender.occupational_info: happy entrepreneur in various international agriculture or food related activities

lender.name: Saqib
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance and a dream.

lender.name: abdoulie
lender.loan_because: I want upgrade my career as a technician on electronics
lender.occupational_info: I work as a technician i do repair tv,radio,photocopiers,printers, and so many things about electronics, i really like y work.

lender.name: Jonathan and Rachel
lender.loan_because: It is one way can show God's love to people on the other side of the world.
lender.occupational_info: Jon is a High School science teacher. Rachel is a stay-at-home mum.

lender.name: Simon
lender.loan_because: there is every reason to do so.

lender.name: Mia
lender.loan_because: I hope that my contribution helps someone to make it a little easier to improve their quality of life. And in finnish KIVA means nice so of course I'll lend some money via them. :)
lender.occupational_info: I work at the Helsinki University Hospital in Helsinki, Finland. As a midwife I deliver babies and take care of mothers and babies after the delivery, teaching the new parents how to take care of their baby.

lender.name: roberto
lender.loan_because: it's a great approach for fear sharing
lender.occupational_info: i create digital tools & music for consciousness development, visit my website for complete info.

lender.name: ann janssen
lender.loan_because: I want to help people in other countries, something small for us means a lot for them
lender.occupational_info: I take care of children from 3 months up to 3 years old. they come to me during the day while their parents go to their job

lender.name: Kenneth
lender.loan_because: I belive in good things, and doing good things will create even more positive things, as well for the target as the one who does the right things!
lender.occupational_info: Iam working with transportation of goods in containers

lender.name: Gail
lender.loan_because: I want to be able to make a difference, even if it's just in a small way. I love Kiva because it allows people to each add their small amounts together to help someone who is working to help themselves and their community.
lender.occupational_info: I am a primary school teacher. I love what I do!

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: I have been so lucky in my life. I try to make a difference in the world. This is a great way to help people who need a hand up.
lender.occupational_info: My law practice is employment law, primarily representing employees. My first book, "The Writer's Guide to the Courtroom" will be released by Behler Publications in November 2009. I am an aspiring writer of children's books.

lender.name: Lennon Family
lender.loan_because: We like to make connections with people all over the world, and help out however we can.

lender.name: Alimul Hakim
lender.loan_because: I don't have enough money to build my business
lender.occupational_info: small store of people basic needs such as food. I don't have enough money to made that business survive. So I need help from another to keep its stay and become survived.

lender.name: Mirka
lender.loan_because: I think we need to help those who are not as privileged. This is a great way!

lender.name: Olivier
lender.loan_because: It is so easy through Kiva to help people, making them proud of their success.

lender.name: Benjamin
lender.loan_because:
I think it simply can help people alot...
Join Kiva lenders around the world for thoughtful conversation, at http://www.kivafriends.org
lender.occupational_info: I design and write software. I also give some trainings.

lender.name: Samford Politics of Developing Nations
lender.loan_because: we can make a difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: We are students and faculty at Samford University in a class on the politics of developing nations.

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: The people looking for loans are doing so much with so little.
lender.occupational_info: I taught English to new immigrants to Canda. One year I taught English in Bolivia.

lender.name: Soren
lender.loan_because: It's GREAT !

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lender.name: UncleGringo
lender.loan_because: I can. I should.
lender.occupational_info: I make computer programs to help people learn.

lender.name: ACIM-St. Pete, FL
lender.loan_because: We loan because we love.

lender.name: Kwanzaa Bunch
lender.loan_because: it is important to share what you have with others. It is a blessing to be able to assist people who are striving to improve the quality of their lives and the lives of their families just like we are.
lender.occupational_info: This donation is the result of a small collection from individual family members during a Kwanzaa celebration who came up with the idea to contribute to Kiva in order to share the principle of Ujamaa (Cooperative Economics) which is to build and maintain our own stores, shops and other businesses and to profit from them together.

lender.name: Sol
lender.loan_because: We all need a helping hand sometimes! ;-)

lender.name: Leo
lender.loan_because: Growing the economy from the bottom is one of the most efficient way of fighting poverty

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.occupational_info: Bloomfield, Ontario, Canada

lender.name: Madrid
lender.occupation: Sr. Acct. Exec. Legal Document Services

lender.name: Shawn
lender.loan_because: It's a great opportunity for me to use some of my good fortune to help others in a positive way.

lender.name: Ron
lender.loan_because: as an independent small business I understand the need for sufficient capital to finance my guitar making. If I can help someone realize this need for themselves and help them succeed, I am happy.
lender.occupational_info: I hand build acoustic guitars and other fretted instruments.

lender.name: Paymon
lender.loan_because:
The banking cartel uses the monetary system/debt as an instrument of control towards corporate globalization!
Micro loans can help people without the need for large banks.
lender.occupational_info: Vigorously Advocating for Animal Rights & Freedom of Speech. Truth, Knowledge and Justice Rather than Conformity, Indifference & Greed.

lender.name: Bradley
lender.loan_because:
I've become addicted to profile-reading on Kiva.
When I was a kid, I lived in the (developing) world. As a young-adult, my single-mom worked long hours to put me through school. When I read Kiva profiles, it reminds me of how small the world is: everyone on planet earth seems to have the same hopes for themselves and their families... Plus, the creativity and practicality that people here show in their business planning is amazing.
lender.occupational_info:
I came here to Italy +4 years ago... to train for running (track & field) and work part-time.
I also expect to start an Italian master's degree in 2008, which is lucky, because university in the USA is very expensive!
So, it seems that with hard work and a little luck things seem to be going well for me. I don't make a lot of money, but I'd like to commit to donating to Kiva at least 4 times per year, and see if the same combination of hard work and luck will work for others!

lender.name: Jeff and Amy
lender.loan_because: I've seen what it can do in people's lives and it's amazing.

lender.name: Aaron
lender.loan_because: the world's gonna end

lender.name: james
lender.loan_because: It is good to give back to enable others to succeed
lender.occupational_info: I advise companies and governments about future trends like technology

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I want to support the global entrepreneurial spirit.
lender.occupational_info: Director of a High School with an emphasis on Music and Art.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I am in an entrepreneurial class and I think Kiva is a good organization.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student and an artist.

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: I can and I should.

lender.name: Jerry
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with enough to share.
lender.occupational_info: I keep computers working and people happy.

lender.name: Jais
lender.occupational_info: Political science

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: Loaning is a great way to directly impact entrepreneurs in a manner that will greatly improve their businesses and lives.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I want my $ to do the most good and go directly to those that are trying to help themselves. Plus, the low loan amount is affordable.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a hospital laboratory performing specimen testing.

lender.name: Pam
lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone deserves a chance in the pursuit of happiness. By lending to our neighbors in other countries it boardens awareness and brings us all closer together.
lender.occupational_info: I am the mother of three wonderful girls.

lender.name: Evelyn / Otakuu
lender.loan_because:
We have a proverb that says 'With your foodbasket and my foodbasket, everyone will be fed and taken care of.'
My little contribution, joined with that of others may change peoples lives for the better. Can there be a greater privilege?
lender.occupational_info: I care for children who cannot live with their families for some reason. I also teach Te Reo MƒÅori at a local primary school

lender.name: Jane
lender.loan_because: Because a little help can go a long way!

lender.name: Stefan
lender.loan_because: I want too give people a chance to make things better...

lender.name: Alberto
lender.whereabouts: San Antonio de los Altos Miranda

lender.name: Kerry
lender.loan_because: To help in a small way, to hopefully improve other people's lives who are trying to be self sustaining.

lender.name: Beverly
lender.loan_because: I'm thrilled that something so small to me can mean so much to someone else -- and that there's a way for us to connect with each other.
lender.occupational_info: My husband and I design clever ways to help people learn how to be better at their jobs.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: I believe that by helping a little, we all benefit.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I am aware of the fact that there are people out there who are less fortunate than me that can benefit a tremendous amount from something that seems so small to most people. I want people to be given the same opportunity to succeed and live a satisfying life just as I have been given.

lender.name: Anders Berg
lender.loan_because: I would like to help other people who doesn't live in the civilized part of the world.

lender.name: Jesper
lender.loan_because: we all have to care more about each other

lender.name: Jared
lender.loan_because: I believe that there is a huge categorical difference between a handout and a help up. Microloans are that difference.
lender.occupational_info: Political science and philosophy graduate of Loyola University Chicago. Graduate student in International Relations at Salve Regina University.

lender.name: Janet
lender.occupation: design iron accessories for the home

lender.name: Jes R. Larsen
lender.loan_because: Kiva is a great initiative and an opportunity to make a difference for someone else.

lender.name: Alfredo
lender.loan_because: I want to help needy /deserving ones

lender.name: Frank
lender.loan_because: I think all people need sometimes is a chance to try.

lender.name: Cori-Ann
lender.loan_because: It can help further a fellow entrepreneur's business.

lender.name: James Darling
lender.loan_because: This is far more profitable than my bank
lender.occupational_info: I create computer software that helps cities recover from disasters.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: Each of us has the responsibility to better another person's life--through our thoughts, our time, or our money. I believe in the power of micro-enterprise development and how it can positively impact a life.
lender.occupational_info: I work with low-income families through a non-profit organization that helps people start small businesses in Minnesota (one of the coldest states in the USA).

lender.name: Mary Ann
lender.loan_because: I find it amazing and gratifying that I can help others with, what in the US, are small amounts of money but can make a big difference in peoples' lives. These loans make me feel that I am directly helping specific people. It's great for all of us!
lender.occupational_info: My work now that I am retired is to help in my community by giving of my time for free. I give my time at a local arboretum by keeping the library open and helping this organization to raise money.

lender.name: albert
lender.loan_because: I want to see my loans make a difference in people's lives and allow people to help themselves.

lender.name: Luis
lender.loan_because: I realized that instead of buying a new pair of pants or a shirt that I don't need, I can positively change the life of one person and his/her family. It's one of many ways of contributing for a better world.

lender.name: isabel
lender.loan_because: i think that sharing is a good idea to change the world And we must change it This is a good way to start
lender.occupational_info: I work in a public hospital, in the outpatient clinic, the noninvasive exams department and the emergency room

lender.name: Leslie
lender.loan_because: I love to travel and explore all the wonderful places and people this world has to offer. Everyone deserves a chance.
lender.occupational_info: I help people with disabilities live in the community.

lender.name: Luis
lender.loan_because: God gives me a happy life. So I need to help others, a way to say thank you,my God!

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: To be able to touch someone's life around the world - that's amazing!
lender.occupational_info: Find new ways of extracting metal from ores.

lender.name: Cynthia and Max
lender.loan_because: I believe that the biggest changes come from many people taking small steps to make the world a better place. I am blessed with opportunities and hope to share these gifts with others.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a firefighter in a big city. My job is to put out the fires, as well as help people who are sick or injured. I love my work!

lender.name: Drucilla
lender.loan_because: It's so easy. And you feel like you are truly doing something that might possibly change someone's life. Isn't that what it is all about? And what we want in our own lives?
lender.occupational_info: I create environmental television.

lender.name: Anne Marie Caragea
lender.loan_because: I want to make the world a better place in every way I can.

lender.name: Ms M's economics class
lender.loan_because: we dare to be more!
lender.occupational_info: we are a class of 7 economics students

lender.name: KC in Old Town
lender.loan_because: I can. I believe in supporting women around the globe and use Kiva because I like the ability of micro-loans to make a personal impact.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that develops large solar projects around the world

lender.name: Antonio
lender.loan_because: I want to help those who are working hard to make a better life for themselves and their family.

lender.name: Heidi Daugherty
lender.loan_because: We want to help others succeed and prosper in a peaceful world. Remember to spay, neuter and adopt your best friend.

lender.name: Stan
lender.loan_because: We are one Body...
lender.occupational_info: Diagnose medical conditions using medical imaginag.

lender.name: Richard & Nancy
lender.loan_because: we would appreciate the loan if the situation were reversed.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: it brings far places that I will probably never see closer to me and I admire the entrepeneurs who are establishing their businesses in this difficult world.
lender.occupational_info: While a librarian I made books and information available to anyone who was looking for it. Now I garden, ride my horse and try to make my community a better place for those who live in it.

lender.name: Duane and Maureen
lender.loan_because: it's so awesome that such a small amount of money changes lives in a very powerful way.
lender.occupational_info: We are both in the business world, so we are drawn toward these small business owners! The challenges they face are much more difficult than anything we have ever been through.

lender.name: ccyl
lender.loan_because: "If you can't do something smart, do something right." This is both.
lender.occupational_info: I help people tell the US government that we want to end poverty at home and abroad. I help others learn how they can help fight hunger and the worst aspects of poverty.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: Small efforts can have a big impact for others.

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: it's exciting and rewarding to be a small part of giving someone in another country the opportunity to start and/or enhance their own business.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a large law firm in Silicon Valley in the Intellectual Property Department.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: It helps improve the world just a little bit at a time.

lender.name: Seth
lender.loan_because: A family member referred me, and it's a good thing to do. Everyone needs a little help sometime.
lender.occupational_info: I count money.

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world.

lender.name: Melanie
lender.loan_because: Luke 12:48 - From everyone who has been given much, much will be required, and from the one who has been entrusted with much, even more will be asked.

lender.name: Sean
lender.loan_because: it makes me feel good to be able to help people improve their livelihoods and better provide for their families.

lender.name: Chad
lender.loan_because: It's fun.
lender.occupational_info: Interesting. Inspiring. Uplifting. Fun. Profitable.

lender.name: Abe
lender.loan_because: I like to help working people.
lender.occupational_info: I fly my spaceship and secretly rule the world.

lender.name: Alizabeth
lender.loan_because: people belive and help me, so i try to also believe in and help others

lender.name: Jan
lender.loan_because: Many years ago, with a $500 bank loan I started a business that grew steadily, did good work, and -- most important to me -- created jobs. It was the most challenging and rewarding venture of my life (short of childraising). I want others to have that opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: Former business owner, now disabled/retired.

lender.name: Mr. M students
lender.loan_because: We are learning about micro financing in our economics class. This is a service learning project for my 7th Grade students. I want them to learn how they can change people's lives for the better!
lender.occupational_info: I teach at the University School of Milwaukee in Wisconsin, U.S.A.

lender.name: JayWu
lender.loan_because: Paying it forward.
lender.occupational_info:
Everyday I'm hustlin', everyday I'm hustlin'--
I do this in honor of my paternal grandmother (ah Mah) who inspires me tremendously. She was born into extreme poverty and cannot read or write-- but she can HUSTLE!
I am a firm believer that the chain of poverty can be broken. The end.

lender.name: Joyce
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance to succeed and support themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am finishing my last year in school, looking for a marketing jo, possibly in the nonprofit sector.

lender.name: Salvador
lender.loan_because: People need a chance to make their dreams a reality.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: I can do my part even if its small
lender.occupational_info: I am an economics major in my senior year of college.

lender.name: Frances
lender.loan_because: I can and I believe--in the dignity of work and supporting people's dreams for a better tomorrow if they're just given an opportunity
lender.occupational_info: I used to do the paperwork that helps organizations and people borrow money interest-free from the city to build or buy affordable housing for low income families.

lender.name: Grace
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student studying International Relations at Seattle Pacific University.

lender.name: Marie-Line
lender.loan_because: I am so lucky to got all these chances in my life that I want to return something to other people. I wish everyone was as lucky as me.

lender.name: Pedro
lender.loan_because: I believe that if every person in the world, lend, even if a dollar, we could create better oportunities for a lot of people.
lender.occupational_info: Well, my job consist in contact, deal, and follow small to high companies, in their mobile telecomunication servi√ßes

lender.name: Scott Keefer
lender.loan_because: I want to assist people in other parts of the world in a real and meaningful way. I make a donation to A Clear Direction's KIVA portfolio each time a client has referred us to someone who takes up our services. KIVA's philosophy sits well with my business as it is engaging in investments that are improving real lives for the better.
lender.occupational_info: I provide independent financial advice to clients including - Financial Planning Strategy, Investment, Life Insurances, Superannuation and Retirement Planning, Debt Reduction and Cash Flow Management.

lender.name: Mia & Jesper
lender.loan_because: We believe this is the best way to help

lender.name: Beatrice and Luc
lender.loan_because:
Life is easier for some of us and a lot more difficult for others. Nevertheless we cannot help everybody. But there are 2 proverbs we'd like to share.
This one about the sea stars, when someone on the beach seeing all these sea stars drying and wondering what difference would it make to put one back in the water when there are so many dying. Looking at the one he had in his hand he thought : at least it will make a difference for this one.
And the other proverb says that it is better to learn fishing than to give fish to someone, for evident reasons....
Kiva is just all of this. Simply BRILLIANT!!!
lender.occupational_info: We work for econology (Ecology at good price) and we love it !!!!!

lender.name: Pedro
lender.loan_because: Generosity consists in giving before beeing asked

lender.name: Pat C.
lender.loan_because: microloans make the most sense for the most people, a way for each of us to help everyone of us.
lender.occupational_info: a small business owner who, if less fortunate, might be on the receiving end of Kiva

lender.name: Marco
lender.whereabouts: Vila Nova de Gaia Vila Nova de Gaia

lender.name: Rune
lender.loan_because: I will help other to succeed to start their own business. I believe that there is no better way to help people so that they again can help themselves and their family.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a company called Hands. Hands is a business integrator for business solutions as Microsoft Dynamics AX.

lender.name: Jorge
lender.loan_because: It's a small step for man. And, who knows, a giant leap for mankind?
lender.occupational_info: Father, husband, cook, software architect...

lender.name: Eduardo
lender.whereabouts: Sao Felix da Marinha Sao Felix da Marinha

lender.name: Sofia
lender.loan_because: I'm not rich but i know that some people need more than i do, and I Like to be able to make their dreams come true.

lender.name: cheryl
lender.loan_because: "In the end, we will remember not the words of our enemies, but the silence of our friends." ~ Martin Luther King Jr

lender.name: Wendell & Chris
lender.loan_because: it is a way to show gratitude for all our blessings. Sharing a little of what we have can make such a big difference in someone's life. We are honored to be members of the KIVA community.
lender.occupational_info: Chris-I help teachers teach and students learn with library resources and computers

lender.name: Andreas
lender.loan_because: I'd rather give some of my money investing in real people's enterprise, craftsmanship and confidence than just putting it all into anonymous bank trusts.

lender.name: Matti
lender.loan_because: I would like to help people having a go at following their dreams.

lender.name: Ines Lamim
lender.loan_because: Happy to be able to help.

lender.name: Tracy
lender.loan_because: I love knowing that someone, somewhere will have joy in their lives because I helped them.

lender.name: Martin
lender.loan_because: I am able to.

lender.name: Christian
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves to have an opportunity to improve their own lives.
lender.occupational_info: I work on a website that teaches people about microfinance and other ways to help make the world a better place.

lender.name: Penelope & Jerome
lender.loan_because: We desire to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I provide consulting in research, grant proposal writing, and other areas of education. My husband writes software.

lender.name: REED
lender.loan_because: JUST BECAUSE
lender.occupational_info: ENTERTAINMENT

lender.name: Tammea
lender.loan_because: we are all in this world together.

lender.name: Cheryl
lender.loan_because: I have so much more than so many, though I have a modest income. A small bit from me can make a critical change. It makes me happy. I feel more connected to people far away I will never meet.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: I have!!
lender.occupational_info: Both rewarding and frustrating

lender.name: Orion Jr. High
lender.loan_because: No man is an island
lender.occupational_info: Spanish students

lender.name: Judy & Jana
lender.loan_because: It makes our hearts feel good to help others achieve their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I work on a computer to pay bills, but I knit bears, hats and blankets and give these gifts to others as payment for my fortune/luck of being born where I was born.

lender.name: Jussi
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Colm
lender.loan_because: I believe micro finance is a critical element to build sustainable enterprise in the developing world.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying market based solutions to conservation and poverty alleviation.

lender.name: C√©sar Marques
lender.loan_because: It's easy to help someone.

lender.name: ALM
lender.loan_because: We can make a difference!

lender.name: Tuuli
lender.loan_because: a great way to help the less privileged
lender.occupational_info: I try my best to make Europe a bit better place to live and work - and my work in the European Commission is very interesting and challenging

lender.name: Ken & Francine
lender.loan_because: we have always been involved in non-profit activities and fully support the concept of microloans to encourage self reliance.

lender.name: Anne
lender.occupation: GM of a Changemaking not-for-profit organisation

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: Fair Trade isn't fair.

lender.name: Svend Erik
lender.occupational_info: Eyedoctor

lender.name: Joe & Sandy
lender.loan_because: We support creating the space for abundant well being for all. This wonderful organization and the amazing people we loan to bring the vision into reality.
lender.occupational_info: Joe writes and publishes books that support, guide, and inspire all of us to connect with unconditonal love, divine heart wisdom, and true spirit essence.

lender.name: Pedro Z
lender.loan_because: The world need us.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: I feel that it's important to help out those who need a helping hand.
lender.occupational_info: I serve in my nation's armed forces.

lender.name: Natalie MacNeil
lender.loan_because: I am passionate about entrepreneurship and believe microcredit can greatly reduce poverty around the world. I traveled extensively as an Ambassador to Canada and throughout my travels I became very interested in microcredit. I researched microcredit further as part of my degree in Political Science and Business. I want to help entrepreneurs have access to credit to start or grow their business.
lender.occupational_info: I am a media strategist and the Co-founder of Imaginarius. I also founded an award winning blog for women entrepreneurs, www.SheTakesOnTheWorld.net.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: It is a way I feel connected with others around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work with people who are injured or very sick.

lender.name: Mimetics
lender.loan_because: I care and I feel happy with it.

lender.name: Paula
lender.loan_because: To give is to receive

lender.name: Rute
lender.loan_because: These are responsible, ambitious and pro-active people. They only need a hand in making their plans and dreams real. Instead of being in my bank account, a part of my money can really help them.
lender.occupational_info: I try to not work. I want to do just what make me feel happy, with good outcomes for others.

lender.name: Nelson Franqueira
lender.loan_because: A small help can make a big difference!
lender.occupational_info: Right now I'm finishing my masters degree in computer engineering.

lender.name: maria jo√£o
lender.loan_because: i just want to help someone

lender.name: Rose
lender.loan_because:
I like helping people help themselves!
I know the power of mircofinance, I experienced first hand growing up when my parents gave me a loan of $200 to purchase a calf I would raise and later resell. I remember the feeling of empowerment! and mirco loans empower! this is just the charity I have been looking for! Thank you Kiva!! :)
lender.occupational_info: I help people discover a new level of health with natural herbs from the Amazon rainforest, which benefits the local people with economy while saving the rainforest in perservation and making it more valuable alive then dead.

lender.name: keg'n'snets
lender.loan_because: We believe in energy flowing for good health whether in body, mind, spirit or planet!

lender.name: Paul and Gail
lender.loan_because: Life has been very good to us so we want to help others realize their dreams

lender.name: Gordon
lender.loan_because: I admire initiative and abhor poverty.... and realize that I have been very lucky in so many areas of my life.
lender.occupational_info: I develop marketing strategies for a major software company.

lender.name: Ana
lender.loan_because: It's a good way to help people

lender.name: Nate
lender.loan_because: This charitable (no interest) micro-lending site is genius, legitimate, and fun! Just the type of creative project I was looking to put a few bucks in. You can get started lending for only $25. It is similar to charitable giving, except that most likely you will get your money back to reinvest. Check it out.

lender.name: Serena
lender.loan_because: I want to.

lender.name: Danny
lender.loan_because: It is an easy way to help people i normally wouldnt get the chance to help

lender.name: Wim
lender.loan_because: I hope this can help someone in the world.
lender.occupational_info: Creating programs for the automation of factory's.

lender.name: artemis @ uucf
lender.loan_because: the women spirit circle is wishing lo help women empower themselfs
lender.occupational_info: a group of women 8-12, coming together to share women spirtuallity in a circle of rotating leadership

lender.name: Stacy
lender.occupational_info: I help people think more critically about ideas and books.

lender.name: Kenny
lender.loan_because: The real question is why shouldn't I loan for I have a roof over my head and my belly is full each night.

lender.name: diane
lender.loan_because: this is a small way for me to help people who want something better for themselves and their families, and they're willing to work for it. one day, who knows, i may need someone to help me.
lender.occupational_info: i make things with my hands and my heart

lender.name: Howard
lender.loan_because: It's such an easy way to make a difference in someones life, I find it extremely rewarding.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a large software company in their online advertising division.

lender.name: Rita
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good!
lender.occupational_info: Occupancy managing in a Hotel.

lender.name: Rinku and Pavan
lender.loan_because: Everyone should get a chance to succeed.

lender.name: Meg
lender.loan_because: I strongly believe in the concept of micro-financing. For such relatively small amounts of money in our society, you can make a huge positive difference in someone's life while preserving their dignity.
lender.occupational_info: I own a website called HarmonyWishes which has images from around the world that can be sent as electronic greeting cards. It's aim is to promote spiritual tolerance and diversity. We are constantly bombarded with negative images by the media. HarmonyWishes aims to balance those images with ones of hope and beauty.

lender.name: judy
lender.loan_because: I want to help people achieve their dreams of becoming independent.
lender.occupational_info: Over the road trucking. Pick up and delivery 48 states and Canada. Very rewarding job. I am proud that I (a woman)made it through truck driving school and now can do something I love to do for a living.

lender.name: peter
lender.loan_because: Because it is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: i work in the office for an int'l shipping company. We transport containers with cargo around the world.

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: We're all in this together.

lender.name: Alexandra
lender.loan_because: Giving and Helping another human being should be everyone's Joy. "Don't give a hungry person a fish, Teach them how to fish".

lender.name: Megan
lender.loan_because: I feel good helping people in need. I've always wanted those people to have what they needed.
lender.occupational_info: I am 9 and in school.

lender.name: Organic Boy Organic Girl
lender.loan_because: I love to give back to the world and touch people that I otherwise couldnt have met or helped. Thank you to Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: design. manufactur and sell organic cotton clothes for children, Made in Australia.

lender.name: Milagro Flores Pezo
lender.loan_because: Deseo hacer crecer mi negocio por lo que solicito a uds se me brinde una oportunidad de poder obtener el capital de negocio que necesito que es de 1800 dolares americanos
lender.occupational_info: Mi trabajo consisten en la fabricacion e instalacion de piscinas jacuzzis, remodelacion de ambientes y todo tipo de acabado de construccion que se encuentra en auge en mi pais

lender.name: EJ V
lender.loan_because: It's kind of like meeting them. I get to learn about them and how I'm helping them.
lender.occupational_info: I am 7 years old and in school.

lender.name: Poupa
lender.loan_because: After much research in development issues, i have reached the conclusion that it is one of the best ways to alleviate poverty.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: I want to support people who are working hard to establish or grow a business.

lender.name: Pedro Mateus
lender.loan_because: I believe each of us can change the world with small actions

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: Kiva makes sense to me. I believe the funds will uplift many families and provide them the tools to help them benefit and prosper. I am their neighbour, no matter the distance.
lender.occupational_info: Caring for the man I love who has prostate cancer. Cooking , (love it!) Gardening (not my forte, but I try) and spending as much time with friends and family as possible.

lender.name: James McGovern
lender.loan_because: I am savage in the pursuit of improving the human condition. Besides, It's our responsibility to help others less prosperous than ourselves...
lender.occupational_info: I work in the computer field with a focus on software security. I have authored several books. I have two sons and the most perfect wife. I am truly blessed.

lender.name: Rod
lender.loan_because: I want to help honest people who want to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I solve problems for people.

lender.name: Evan
lender.loan_because: it's important that money facilitates progress, change, and encourages financial responsibility. If the adage of teaching a man to fish holds true, I would rather help to solve a problem rather than delay it.
lender.occupational_info: I study computer science at New Mexico State University, located in the southern United States.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I know what it's like to be so close in working toward a dream and to fall short because of money.
lender.occupational_info: I've worked for major internet companies, a national magazine, and a hollywood studio. I've also dug ditches, fried burgers, and scrubbed toilets. All professionally. I'm proud of all the work I've done.

lender.name: Brenda Olson-Wray
lender.loan_because: I've made a loan on behalf of my father, Dwight Olson. I have his name this year for Christmas and we have to give something homemade. I didn't quite follow the rules but my dad is big on giving to others so to honor this I gave a loan to help someone provide for their family. Plus my dad is big on eating so what better to support than a bakery:)

lender.name: Jon
lender.loan_because: I believe in the unity of mankind and the dignity of work done in the spirit of service. By loaning through Kiva, I hope to promote those ideals, in a small way.
lender.occupational_info: I teach young people about the lifetime sport of disc golf (golf played with frisbee-like discs) and promote events of the sport.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: Eirik made me do it

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I really believe that it makes a difference in someone's life and it is all going to the right place.
lender.occupational_info: Work with people who are dying and with older people in nursing homes.

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping others who are willing to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I market and sell computer technology for securing electronic payments.

lender.name: Heidi
lender.loan_because: I want other people to have the opportunities that I have had.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: Part of our responsibility in life is to assist others.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: I believe that people need a chance to create a dignified existence and chase their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: Outdoor Educator - Teaching personal and environmental values and leadership in the wilderness outside the classroom walls.

lender.name: Denice
lender.loan_because: It feels good to contribute to their success. I received the Kiva gift certificate in the memory of my Mom. It was a special gift that keeps giving.
lender.occupational_info: I am a mother of 3 children and self employed in the health and education field.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: I believe in the principles of micro-lending and want to help those who have taken the initiative to help themselves.

lender.name: Wendy
lender.loan_because: I want to help other people succeed in their businesses and their dreams. I especially wish to help women who may not have the same opportunities as the men in their countries.
lender.occupational_info: I run a small business, too. I work with families to help them understand their indigo children. Indigos are spiritually advanced people who often feel they don't fit in and may seem rebellious, but are truly remarkable people that will thrive if they are supported. I also do psychic readings and energy healing (Shamballa Reiki). My most important work, however, is being a mom to my son who was born this past year.

lender.name: Carter and Grant
lender.loan_because: We care about others and we love animals!

lender.name: Megan
lender.loan_because: I have been so lucky and everyone deserves to reach their dreams.

lender.name: aaron
lender.occupational_info: I go to school

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: It's the simplest way to contribute in a sustainable manner.
lender.occupational_info: I help make computer software work by designing features and driving projects to completion.

lender.name: Chelsea
lender.loan_because: I can. Toss a pebble into a lake & see how far the ripples go.

lender.name: Ashley
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I am a J.D./Ph.D. in social psychology student as Arizona State University.

lender.name: Victoria
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good!

lender.name: Louise
lender.loan_because: A little can go a long way. "Lending" money encourages economic independence. And every human being strives for that no matter where they live in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I care for critically ill patients.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: To help make positive change in the world and to show the world the positive face of America.

lender.name: Massie
lender.loan_because: A small contribution can have an impact and I like the idea of helping entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: Risk Management

lender.name: Christina
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves the opportunity to make their dreams come true.
lender.occupational_info: Lending is fun!

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: One of the best feelings in the world is knowing that you made a positive impact on someone's life and loaning makes it possible to touch someone anywhere in the world!
lender.occupational_info: My personal mission is to empower and inspire people to become healthier and happier through gradual, but lasting dietary and lifestyle changes. I do this by working with people in a 6 month model that sets the stage for the rest of their life!

lender.name: Judith
lender.loan_because: It's an amazing experience! It's truly fabulous to make a loan to someone half way around the world - and know that small act has made a diffence to someone who is working hard to improve their life. It is a gift that works both ways!
lender.occupational_info: My work is helping people when they are sick in the hope that they will become well again.

lender.name: Jaspal
lender.loan_because: Why wouldn't I?
lender.occupational_info: I work to 'green' industrial development that minimzes environmental impacts by reducing water & energy use, and generates less waste.

lender.name: Gye Nyame
lender.occupation: Ubi caritas et amor et vera, Deus ibi est.
lender.loan_because: God is not unjust; he will not forget your work and the love you have shown him as you have helped his people and continue to help them. Hebrews 6:10
lender.occupational_info: "And the King answering shall say to them, 'Verily, I say to you, In as much as ye have done it to one of the least of these my brethren, ye have done it to me.' Matthew 25:40

lender.name: KYMBERLY
lender.occupation: OWNER ~ HOPE FOUNDATION RESPITE CARE, CALIFORNIA

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: A cute Iranian girl asked me to use Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: I make revolutionary contributions towards eliminating suffering and illnesses.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I want to give back to this world.

lender.name: Chris Crosby
lender.loan_because: I Care

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: I believe that we are all essentially part of one global community and should treat others as we would wish to be treated.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: Donating my interest rate is the most powerful way to make my savings work for good
lender.occupational_info: Trying to ensure positive social side benefits for one of the world's largest carbon credit development companies

lender.name: Pedro
lender.loan_because: My drop with your drop, can make an ocean.

lender.name: Geri
lender.loan_because: it feels great to be able to really make a difference in someone's life

lender.name: Ingrid
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people to help themselves. Microloans are just prefect for that.

lender.name: Christina
lender.loan_because: The KIva concept is spot on..... People helping themselves with a little hand from the lenders. I am so happy to be part of this.
lender.occupational_info: I am a semi-retired advertising exec and now I work as graphic designer on my Macintosh computer. In my pix you can also see my beloved wire-haired dachshund called Jenny!

lender.name: Marie & Thierry
lender.loan_because: For us, it simply is a joy to try and help people in need to sort their problems out. We strongly believe microcredit is a powerful tool for removing poverty from our planet.
lender.occupational_info: What doctors try to achieve around the world: caring for and occasionally curing people's health problems.

lender.name: Noriko
lender.occupational_info: My job is to help people fulfill their dreams.

lender.name: I Team Students
lender.loan_because: We are very proud that the World Food Prize is held every year in Des Moines Iowa! As part of learning about one of the previous World Food Prize laureates (later named 2006 Nobel Peace Prize recipient!)we watched a video called Pennies a Day (Izzit.org) which described the impact microloans can have on the lives of people in need. We had a "Penny War" contest between classes and raised $150.00 to fund 6 $25.00 microloans.
lender.occupational_info: We are Iowa junior high students who are learning that we can do community service globally as well as locally through organizations like Kiva!

lender.name: Patricia Woldring
lender.loan_because: I believe poverty is a crime against humanity.

lender.name: Mariana
lender.loan_because: Each one of us can make a difference, including me.

lender.name: Birte
lender.loan_because: I hope i can make a little difference for people in Africa.Hello from Denmark.

lender.name: Lilliam
lender.loan_because: it would be a scandal not to, after all the benefits I've been given.
